u.user_id > 1 AND s.dept_id = #{deptId} AND s.grade = #{grade} AND s.status = #{status} AND u.gender = #{gender}
AND u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND u.login_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') AND u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')
AND ( u.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR u.login_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') OR u.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%') )
ORDER BY u.user_id DESC
